name: Climb Jumper
description:
Current plans

  • Checkpoints-Portals 
    • Start game only with 2 tail segments
    • on each portal get one more segments
    • got stuck? - teleport to last visited portals
  • Level generation - each time generate unique random level
  • UI - indicate direction to closest portal if you are in the radius of 2 screens
  • Main goal - reach the highest portal in 25-30 minutes max.
  • And main super cool features - MULTIPLAYER !
